Control.OnInitialized: ItemTrig.UI.WViewHolder:install(self) -- -- We can't guarantee execution order for the holder and views, -- so we need to rely on this ugly hack. -- local function setup() local widget = ItemTrig.UI.WViewHolder:cast(self) if widget.postInstall then return end for i = 1, self:GetNumChildren() do local view = ItemTrig.UI.WViewHolderView:cast(self:GetChild(i)) if view then view:postInstall() end end widget.postInstall = true end ZO_PreHookHandler(self, "OnEffectivelyShown", setup)
